QuestData.Title: Tanaris is Calling
QuestData.Description: Heya, $n, Kelsey Steelspark down in Tanaris left a message for you. She says that the gnomes down there in Gadgetzan heard about what you've been doing up here.$B$BAnyway, the Cataclysm hit them hard, too. Not as hard as us, but I'm certain they could use your help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kelsey Steelspark at Gadgetzan in Tanaris.
QuestData.RewardText: Greetings and salutations, friend. Welcome to Tanaris!
